hero.title_start: Solve the Language of Your Soil
hero.subtitle: This project is an academic study aiming to increase agricultural efficiency by combining IoT sensor data and advanced machine learning algorithms.

features.label: PROJECT ARCHITECTURE
features.title: Holistic Field Management
features.subtitle: We offer technologies that allow you to make strategic decisions for the future, not just instant data.

iot.title: IoT Integration
iot.desc: Monitor soil moisture, temperature and pH values instantly 24/7 with our ESP32 based sensors.

recommendation.title: Smart Crop Recommendation
recommendation.desc: Our multi-label ML models offer the most suitable product portfolio such as Tomato, Pepper or Corn according to your field's characteristics.

xai.title: Explainable Analysis (XAI)
xai.desc: AI is no longer a 'black box'. We explain why the model recommends that product with transparent graphics.

steps.title: Planning Agricultural Future in 3 Steps
steps.subtitle: We provide access to scientific data by simplifying complex analysis processes.

step1.title: Field Data Entry
step1.desc: The location of the field is selected on the map and IoT sensors are paired.

step2.title: Data Collection & Processing
step2.desc: The system automatically combines sensor data and satellite-derived soil data (SoilGrids).

step3.title: Recommendation Report
step3.desc: A detailed report explaining which crop should be planted and why is presented.

research.title: Academic Research Project
research.desc: Solara is a student project aiming to provide technological infrastructure for sustainable agriculture practices.
